mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your sense of entitlement is our top priority! Get ready to experience banking like never before, with interest rates as inflated as our customers' egos!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, there I was, strolling into my favorite caf, ready to order my usual triple-shot, extra foam, caramel macchiato. But as I approached the counter, the barista had the audacity to ask, "Would you like to try our new seasonal drink today?" I mean, can you believe the nerve? Without skipping a beat, I dramatically threw my arm over my forehead, exclaiming, "How dare you suggest I deviate from my perfected order! Do you not understand the delicate balance of my caffeine needs?" The entire caf fell silent, the barista stuttering an apology as I graciously accepted my rightful macchiato. As I sipped my drink, I couldn't help but feel validated in my entitlement, knowing that some things are just too sacred to change.
